original_text: Then I saw a great white throne and him who was seated on it. From his presence earth and sky fled away, and no place was found for them.
korean_text: 또 내가 크고 흰 보좌와 그 위에 앉으신 이를 보니 땅과 하늘이 그 앞에서 피하여 간 데 없더라

sentences.original_text: Then I saw a great white throne
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 나는 크고 흰 보좌를 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: and him who was seated on it
and no place was found for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 위한 곳은 찾아볼 수 없었습니다
